insert into sys_user_t (sz_email, sz_password, sz_phone, ts_created, ts_updated, nt_row_state, nt_row_version) values (#{szEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ntRowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_user_t set sz_email = #{szEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_password = #{szPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_phone = #{szPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ts_created = #{tsCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts_updated = #{tsUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nt_row_state = #{ntRowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nt_row_version = #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sz_id = #{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sz_id, sz_email, sz_password, sz_phone, ts_created, ts_updated, nt_row_state, nt_row_version from sys_user_t where sz_id = #{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
